name: Aerial Movements
description: Develop acrobatic jumping techniques to enhance agility and combat versatility.

cards.title: Butterfly Kick
cards.description: A signature Wushu move combining aerial grace with combat effectiveness.
bulletpoints: Lean forward and sweep the legs in a circular motion
Generate lift by pushing off with both feet
Use arm movement to stabilize in midair
cards.summaryText: Drive the butterfly kick by leaning through the sweep and floating level with steady arms.

cards.title: 540 Kick
cards.description: An advanced spinning kick requiring exceptional control and explosiveness.
bulletpoints: Initiate a strong jump with a full-body rotation
Focus on tucking the legs for additional spin
Land softly with proper weight distribution
cards.summaryText: Launch the 540 with a tight tuck, snap the strike midair, then melt into a quiet landing.
